snippet: Ban Ki-moon, the United Nations secretary general, raised the possibility that thousands of international peacekeeping troops in Africa might have to be temporarily redeployed in the Central African Republic, one of the most unstable on the...
abstract: United Nations Secretary General Ban Ki-moon raises the possibility that thousands of international peacekeeping troops in Africa may have to be temporarily redeployed in the Central African Republic, one of the most unstable countries on the continent.
lead_paragraph: Ban Ki-moon, the United Nations secretary general, raised the possibility that thousands of international peacekeeping troops in Africa might have to be temporarily redeployed in the Central African Republic, one of the most unstable on the continent.
